channel.title: Java Help
channel.description:
I just recently started trying to make a RS Client and Server, it's taking a bit of time, and I can't seem to get it to compile, it keeps saying "error in java.class.main.thread" or something like that, and before, it said that "javac" isn't recognized, and I've installed JDK 6, and it still doesn't work, and I couldn't find a forum sub to post this in, so I guess it's classified as "Java programming" so, if someone would like to help walk me through making and learning this, I'd most appreciate it, my e-mail is demon.raven0@hotmail.com
Thank you in advance!
